about_the_game: This is a limited demo that ends after stage 3. Test your luck against the zombies and see if you like the game before buying! If you have feedback or questions regarding the demo, please contact us via our Discord server or via the email address on the store page!

name: Mortalis Meltdown Demo
short_description: Mortalis Meltdown Demo contains the full endless zombie shooter that you will find in the full release, only that it is not quite as endless after all (the game will end when you complete stage 3).
